ygData.subject: Heritrix 3.2.0 now available

Subject: Heritrix 3.2.0 now available

Heritrix 3.2.0 final release is now available. See the following
Release Notes page on the project wiki for full details:

https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Release+Notes+-+Heritrix+3.2.0

Binary (-dist) and source (-src) distributions are available at:

http://builds.archive.org/maven2/org/archive/heritrix/heritrix/3.2.0/

As always, problem reports, ideas, fix/feature contributions, and
other kinds of feedback are all welcome here on the list and on the
project wiki and JIRA issue tracker:

Heritrix Wiki: https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Heritrix
Heritrix JIRA: https://webarchive.jira.com/browse/HER

Noah
